p: All animal experiments were carried out on the strict basis of ethical guidelines, Animal Welfare Act, and the references of Accreditation of Laboratory Animal Care and other national regulations and rules relating to animals. All animal operational protocols were approved by the Institutional Laboratory Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) and the Laboratory Animal Management Ethics Committee at Shanghai Public Health Clinical Center (2016-A021-01) (Approved on 8 September 2016).
